New Records: The Chicago White Sox are tied with the 1962 New York Mets for the modern major league record for losses in a season with 120 losses.
Key Match Events: Andrew Benintendi delivered a walk-off RBI single in the 10th inning to give the Chicago White Sox a 4-3 victory over the Los Angeles Angels.
Post-Match Reflections: The Chicago White Sox avoided a 121st loss, putting their record at 38-120 for the season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Los Angeles Angels matched their franchise record with their 95th loss, shared with the 1968 and 1980 teams.
